name: Therme București – Galaxy
blurb: Family zone with wave pool and slides; ideal for kids, with food courts and loungers.

name: Therme București – The Palm & Elysium
blurb: Adults-only wellness areas with mineral pools, themed saunas, Aufguss rituals and spa treatments.

name: Peleș Castle – Official Museum
blurb: Neo-Renaissance royal residence with ornate interiors; guided tours in multiple languages.
notes: Last entry earlier; seasonal closures posted on site.

name: Pelișor Castle (Annex Museum)
blurb: Art Nouveau residence of Queen Marie; smaller but richly decorated interiors.

name: Bran Castle – Official
blurb: Medieval hilltop fortress linked to the Dracula legend; exhibits on Queen Marie.

name: Walkabout Free Tours – Brașov
blurb: Daily tip-based walking tours led by licensed local guides covering Brașov's medieval core.

name: Tour Guide Brașov (Private Guide)
blurb: Authorized local guide offering customizable city and castle day tours.

name: R&J Ski School Poiana Brașov
blurb: Established ski & snowboard school with rentals and private/group lessons near main lifts.

name: Interski Romania – Poiana Brașov
blurb: Kids and adult lessons with certified instructors; rentals and convenient base near slopes.

name: Discover Danube Delta – Tulcea Office
blurb: Licensed operator offering small-boat wildlife trips, photo tours and multi-day programs.
notes: Hours for office; tours run daily in season.

name: SAFCA Delta Tours
blurb: Group and private Danube Delta tours with daily departures Apr–Sep; local skippers.

name: Lacerta Winery – Visits & Tasting
blurb: Modern hillside winery with panoramic terrace; guided tastings by appointment.

name: Budureasca Winery – Visitor Centre
blurb: Large estate with guided cellar tours and tasting flights; shop on site.

name: SERVE – Ceptura Winery
blurb: Historic boutique winery; tastings by reservation focusing on premium blends.

name: Salina Turda – Main Entrance
blurb: Underground park with boat lake, Ferris wheel and exhibits—family-friendly and unique.

name: National Village Museum – Ticket Office
blurb: Open-air village showcasing authentic houses, churches and workshops from across Romania.

name: Hello Bucovina Travel & Tours
blurb: Licensed operator for daily and private Bucovina monastery circuits from Suceava.

name: Voroneț Monastery (stop)
blurb: UNESCO-listed monastery famed for the intense 'Voroneț blue' exterior frescoes.

name: BearWatching.ro (Brasov)
blurb: Short trips to ranger-managed hides near Brașov for ethical bear observation.

name: Transylvanian Wolf – Wildlife Tours
blurb: Local wildlife specialists offering bear-hide evenings and nature walks around Piatra Craiului.

name: Parc Aventura Brașov
blurb: Multiple rope courses and ziplines over the lake; gloves and gear included.

name: Black Sea Paddlers
blurb: Sea-kayak tours and training along the southern coast; safety gear and boats provided.

name: Bucharest Pub Crawl (GetYourGuide meeting point)
blurb: Hosted crawl through 3–4 bars with shots and club entry; guides coordinate venues based on the night.

name: Cluj Pub Crawl (GetYourGuide check-in)
blurb: Guide-led crawl to busy student bars and a club; drink deals and games included.

name: Green Hours Jazz & Theatre Café
blurb: Bucharest's original jazz courtyard with ticketed concerts and intimate jam sessions.

name: The Jazz Club (JazzBook)
blurb: Cozy living-room vibe with local quartets, singer–songwriters and themed tribute nights.

name: Central Park (Chios / Ethnographic Park stages)
blurb: Open-air stages across the park; family areas and workshops alongside concerts.

name: Domeniile Budureasca
blurb: Large cellar with barrel rooms and guided tastings; boutique shop on site.

name: S.E.R.V.E. Ceptura
blurb: Pioneer quality estate; guided tastings of Cuvée lines with sommelier notes.

name: Paint & Party Studio (Universitate)
blurb: Guided paint nights with all materials and a bar; fun, beginner-friendly atmosphere.

name: Art & Hobby Studio
blurb: Workshops in painting, calligraphy and crafts; occasional wine & paint evenings.

name: Art & Hobby Studio – Ceramics
blurb: Clay hand-building and glazing workshops; pieces fired and collected on a later date.

name: PadelMania Pipera
blurb: Indoor/outdoor padel venue with coaching and rentals; lively social scene.

name: Peak Padel Cluj (Florești)
blurb: Modern covered courts with coaching programs and racquet rentals.

name: Stejarii Country Club – Tennis
blurb: Premium clay and hard courts with certified coaches; guest access by prior arrangement.

name: Nemo Diving Center (Eforie Nord)
blurb: Intro dives and courses with boat or shore entries; full kit supplied.

name: ScubaZone Constanța (Dive Center)
blurb: Try-dives and PADI/CMAS training; weekend boat trips to reefs and wrecks.

name: SetSail Sailing School (Constanța Marina)
blurb: Weekend beginner courses and skipper training on keelboats; classroom + on-water.

name: Guided Photo Walk – Cluj Old Town
blurb: Hands-on composition and manual-mode coaching while exploring historic squares and side streets.

name: Old Town Meeting Point (Lipscani)
blurb: Central meet for small-group food walks through markets and eateries.

name: Caru' cu Bere
blurb: Iconic beer hall serving classic Romanian dishes—often a featured tasting stop.

name: Chef's Home Studio (central)
blurb: Hands-on class culminating in a shared dinner; wine included on many dates.

name: Ana Health Spa – Hotel Europa
blurb: Sea-view balneary center with mud treatments, hydrotherapy and massage.

name: Aqvatonic Med Spa – Steaua de Mare
blurb: Heated hydrotherapy circuit, jets and saunas—book day access or treatments.

name: Potcoava Mountain Hideout
blurb: Ranch specialising in trail rides and clinics; helmets and matching included.

name: Telecabina Bușteni (Cable Car)
blurb: Access to the Bucegi plateau; service depends on wind and weather.

name: Apuseni Experience (guide office)
blurb: Licensed guides for Scărișoara and Apuseni trails; transport options.

name: Cheile Turzii Visitor Centre
blurb: Entry ticketing and trail maps; local guides for hire.

name: Viscri 125 Guesthouse (bike rental)
blurb: Bike rentals and guided tours around the village and countryside.

name: Bucharest Geek Hub
blurb: Cozy board-game café with a deep library, staff recommendations, and regular social nights in the heart of the Old Town.

name: Snakes & Wizards Board Game Café
blurb: Friendly board-game space with snacks, themed nights, and lots of modern strategy titles; great for mixed-level groups.

name: Mojo Music Club
blurb: Legendary Old Town multi-level venue hosting the Big British Bucharest Quiz plus live bands and karaoke through the week.

name: The PUB Universității
blurb: Tap-your-own-beer tables, live music and weekly events; book a team table for themed quiz nights at Km 0.

name: The Void Escape Room
blurb: Immersive rooms (Coven, Madhouse, Tahicardia) with strong theming and tech; teams of 2–7; English-friendly staff.

name: Inside Rooms
blurb: Three varied games with creative puzzles; 60–90 minute scenarios; close to Piața Unirii; English instructions available.

name: NOR Sky Casual Restaurant
blurb: Panoramic dining at the top of SkyTower with window tables for sunset views; refined Romanian-inspired menu.

name: LINEA/Closer to the Moon
blurb: Stylish rooftop with creative cocktails, photo-friendly décor and seasonal pop-ups; popular for golden-hour dates.

name: LaȘtunul Boats – Herăstrău Park
blurb: Rowboats and small electric boats for private laps around the lake; pay-by-time with optional extras.

name: Snagov Club Boats
blurb: Private skipper-led cruises; add sparkling wine or picnics; easy access from Bucharest (c. 40–60 min).

name: Edenland Park
blurb: Big forest adventure park with ziplines, aerial circuits, archery, paintball and cafés; close to city.

name: Parc Aventura Comana
blurb: Treetop routes, zipline and boats in a nature park; food stalls and shaded rest areas for families.

name: TNT Brothers – Clinceni DZ
blurb: Tandem skydives with video add-ons; modern aircraft; dropzone shop on site; weekends book up fast.

name: Squash4All
blurb: Five WSF-spec courts, coaching, and equipment rental; convenient for after-work play; online booking.

name: Badminton Armada (Elite Performance Center)
blurb: Daily coached groups and open courts; easy online booking; rackets available; friendly club culture.

name: Cotroceni on Ice (AFI Mall)
blurb: Year-round indoor rink with rental skates, themed sessions and lessons; perfect rainy-day activity in AFI mall.

name: White Tiger Archery
blurb: Indoor range with beginner courses and equipment included; small-group coaching in English available on request.

blurb: Cozy board-game café with a deep library, staff recommendations, and regular social nights in the heart of the Old Town.

name: Cotroceni on Ice (AFI Mall)
blurb: Year-round indoor rink with rental skates, themed sessions and lessons; perfect rainy-day activity in AFI mall.

name: White Tiger Archery
blurb: Indoor range with beginner courses and equipment included; small-group coaching in English available on request.

name: Mojo Music Club
blurb: Legendary Old Town spot with karaoke seven nights a week, live bands, sports screens, and late closing—perfect for big social nights.

name: Trickshot Promenada
blurb: Sleek lanes, billiards and arcade games with a lively crowd, cocktails and a full kitchen—book lanes ahead for peak times.

name: Trickshot Mega Mall
blurb: Bowling, billiards and arcade games under one roof with a restaurant vibe—good for big groups and birthdays.

name: Gateway VR Studio
blurb: Free-roam VR arenas, escape games and racing sims with hosts to guide newcomers; ideal for team events.

name: Escape Arena
blurb: Big, cinematic rooms (e.g., Indiana Jones) with 75-minute sessions; English-friendly staff.

name: The Void Escape Room
blurb: Award-nominated escape rooms like Tahicardia and Coven with strong storytelling and immersive tech.

name: Candlelight Concerts (various venues)
blurb: Intimate, candlelit performances across the city's prettiest halls; reserve seats directly in the app.
notes: Venue and hours vary per date

name: Observatorul Astronomic Amiral Vasile Urseanu
blurb: Public observation nights with telescopes and exhibitions; low-key, atmospheric date.

name: Debarcader Central Herăstrău (ALPAB)
address: Parcul Regele Mihai I – Debarcader Central
blurb: Rowboats, pedalos, and lake mini-cruises; pay-as-you-go with posted tariffs; easy date idea.

name: VMAX Karting Romexpo
blurb: Multi-level indoor electric karting with live timing and lounge; arrive & drive or events.

name: AMCKart Tunari
blurb: 1.24-km outdoor circuit with multiple kart classes and night lighting; gear available on site.

name: Vertical Spirit (Baicului)
blurb: Big routes, auto-belays and classes; rental gear on site—great for beginners and training.

name: LaserMaxx (Vitan/Unirii)
blurb: Neon maze arena with vests and real-time scoring; group packages and unlimited-play deals mid-week.

name: Laser Megazone (Titan Park)
blurb: Popular arena near Titan Park; glow-lit labyrinth and session packages for groups and parties.

name: PadelX Romexpo Courts
blurb: Modern padel club with multiple courts, socials and coaching; rent rackets/balls when you book.

name: ARGMAN Football Complex
blurb: Multiple quality turf pitches with lights and changing rooms; book recurring evening slots for leagues.
